body:
It'd be a bit better if Tomao or whatever his/her name is would just pretend to be a guy instead of actually turn into one :(
I like tomboys, not girls that can become boys.
Only gender bender I like is if mc gets turned into a girl like in ranma :/
This is one of those doujin that inspire you and give you depression at the same time.
This is blessed. How can this be so underrated?
So fucking underrated. SO fkin underrated.

3 yrs later, I still have the same thought.
Lufu plsplsplsplsplspls
I love the friend but both are good.
This goodness, this is what the world should strive towards.
The art was a bit inconsistent and the censorship was awful for the most part, but the girls were cute enough to make up for it. Really hot and cute succubus doujin.
@dafargeg your commenting this on a hentai website, have you ever thought that maybe your the sissy?
I now want a succubus... Lufu plsplsplspls
Goddess damned epic
this didnt get me hard it just made me cry I LOVED IT

This is absurdly good, the story is decent and the artstyle is amazing, plus the extra characters development is far from a normal harem manga/hentai, as least the MC doesn't have the impenetrable brain
This is what got me into gender bender! I regret nothing!
Wish it was the other tank that was translated instead of the shitty whiteout censored one. Still damn good nonetheless.

Stop freaking out, Tamao is a succubus (demon girl) ,the only reason she transformed into a male form was to contain her powers from affecting her schoolmates and from maybe assaulting the MC she loves , but after being accepted by him ,when they're in the house or another place ,she returns to her original form. 

Also when they joke about 'maybe he's some kind of succubus as well" they're talking about the MC not them. 

So fap with pleasure and dont' worry about that genderbender tag.

That was absurdly long...and entirely worth the hour of my life it ate to read it all. To be fair though...is it really Gender Bending, if Tamao was a succubus to begin with, and hiding in a male form? I mean, they'd call it an Incubus if he was the guy version? That's what I was reading, but maybe something is being lost in translation? They did joke 'maybe he's some kind of succubus as well" so it could just be that the author/translator doesn't know of using the term Incubus? 
Ah well, whatever. Cute and sexy is all that matters here, with a decent story to match.
Where's the gender bender?
lol jazzboy's an insecure lil sissy in the closet
Damn, this was great, so much for sleep huh. <3
Mutsutake is an amazing author but just as many others, there's a shit ton, untranslated works out there, still very pleased this is finished.
Nice storyline
Also, Meguridokoro when?
Holy shit yes!!!
After reading this again.........how i wish succubus does exist *lil bit tears falls down, cries in the corner*

-reads the tags-

Oh sweet jesus, yes
Have been waiting for the full version of this for years
